column5: Human readable text that identifies the person who created the Comment. See also @PersonalID.
Identification that is used to reference the Comment.
Human readable language of the Comment.

Machine readable identifier of the employee that entered the comment. When the Comment is created by a person with a known Contact/@UserID, then @PersonalID SHOULD contain the value of Contact/@UserID.
Describes the date and time when the Comment was created.
@Type specifies the usage of a comment.
Body of the comment. Note: Whitespace is preserved only as generic whitespace in XML. Applications that display comments to the user SHOULD maintain whitespace.
